idea: We Provide quick and fast preparation for taxation laws and updates. Tax consultants, also know as tax advisors, are experts in tax law, planning and compliance. They serve businesses and individuals alike by staying current on new tax law and positioning taxpayers for short and long term tax optimization. A tax consultant typically expands on the role of tax preparer.
name: Vilas Bailkar

idea:
The World's First Borderless Patient Data Aggregator and a unique Cloud Electronic Record and Tele-Consult Solution based on our unique Master Patient Record (MPR) number.

 

Patients, Doctors, Medical Health Care Workers, Para-Clinical and Para-Medical Professionals and all stake holders will be based on one platform to provide a seamless transition for patients to get the optimal health care outcomes in a low risk high security platform.

 

Compliant with all Government regulations and guidelines providing a safe and secure medico-legally compliant platform to provide ease of Health Care Delivery Solutions with a variety of options for all stake holders.

 

Unique National Call Center to handle and assist patients who are not technologically adept to onboard them and assist in connecting them to their doctors with ease and reduced anxiety. At the same time maintaining the highest privacy norms and ensuring Patients get the Doctors they want, whenever they want.

 

Designed by Doctors who have worked in their respective specialities for more than 20 years. Bringing all the best practises of a collaborative health care community on one platform.


The Doctors platform is designed using the best practises to make the Case Sheet the central pivot. Speciality Specific Templates and Custom Designed case sheets to make ease of prescription fast and easy. Speech to Text functionality and a Drug Data Base of more than 150,000 drugs with the option to add as you go and a Laboratory Investigation database of more than 40,000 requests with option to add more as you go all make this a fantastic and addictive tool for doctors in their clinics.

 

Designed from inputs from hundreds of doctors and addressing the multiple issues faced in a clinical environment today. Multi Clinics, Multi Institution and a floating record which can be accessed by doctors with EXPLICIT PATIENT CONSENT to help deliver the best medical advise by doctors.

 

In Future using Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to provide Point of Care suggestions to doctors on their patients need and care patterns
name: QUEIRA TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea:
MG2KG MACARISM is formed by a team of seasoned professionals with a combined experience of 50+ years in the education sector. The team has come together with an aspiration to support all deserving children from the economically weaker section, in availing required mentoring and guidance necessary for achieving success in competitive examinations at the regional and national level. Through this initiative, we also encourage these children to acquire extra-curricular interests or skills, such as dancing, singing, painting, communication etc. 

MG2KG MACARISM is taking a necessary initiative in the endeavour to facilitate all such students by integrating the traditional mode of teaching with the latest technology.


MG2KG MACARISM is aiming to be an integral part of the journey of young children in realising their dream and to transform from MILLIGRAM 2 KILOGRAM(ie. becoming small to BIG or no one to Someone) and finally bring out happiness in their life i.e. MACARISM.


MG2KG MACARISM is formed by a team of seasoned professionals with over 50+ years combined experience in the education sector with a pure aspiration to support all deserving & deprived young children to avail all required mentoring & guidance necessary for achieving success through various competitive examinations at the regional and national level or by acquiring special skills & profession knowledge through our Network of MG2KG MACARISM Study Centres across the nation. Students would also have the option to join MG2KG MACARISM classes online from home if there is no MG2KG MACARISM Study Centre nearby.

MG2KG MACARISM is taking a necessary initiative in the endeavour to facilitate all such deprived but deserving students by integrating the traditional mode of teaching by integrating it with the latest technology particularly from small towns.
name: MG2KG MACARISM
